sentences.english: Before I got these, my allergies would turn into weeks-long sinus infections.
sentences.chinese: 在我开始使用前，过敏症状已变成持续几周的鼻炎。

sentences.english: Need not medicaments and become an operation, the good method that treats rhinitis is there?
sentences.chinese: 不用药物和做手术，有什么好的治疗鼻炎的好方法吗？

sentences.english: Objective To explore the curative effect and mechanism of hyperbaric oxygenation(HBO) therapy for perennial allergic rhinitis.
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨高压氧治疗常年性变应性鼻炎的疗效及机理。

sentences.english: OBJECTIVE: To observe the effects of Xinyi Biyan pill containing Fructus Xanthii on liver function.
sentences.chinese: 目的研究含有苍耳子的辛夷鼻炎丸对肝脏功能的影响。

sentences.english: Objective:To investigate the effects of progesterone on nasal mucosa in acute rhinitis rat models.
sentences.chinese: 目的研究氦氖激光照射对急性鼻炎患者的治疗作用。

sentences.english: Objective To observe the effects of Tiaomian-tuomin (TMTM) capsule in treating perennial allergic rhinitis.
sentences.chinese: 目的观察调免脱敏胶囊治疗常年性变应性鼻炎的疗效。

sentences.english: Objective To research an effective method of the operation treatment for vasomotor rhinitis.
sentences.chinese: 研究目的探讨血管运动性鼻炎手术治疗的有效方法。

sentences.english: OBJECTIVE To study the therapeutic effects of Tongbi capsule on allergic rhinitis in guinea pigs.
sentences.chinese: 探讨通鼻胶囊对豚鼠变态反应性鼻炎的抑制作用。

sentences.english: Objective To investigate the therapeutic effect of He-Ne laser irradiation on acute rhinitis.
sentences.chinese: 目的研究氦氖激光照射对急性鼻炎患者的治疗作用。

sentences.english: What symptom can irritability rhinitis have?
sentences.chinese: 过敏性鼻炎会有什么症状？

sentences.english: Relief of acute and chronic rhinitis symptoms.
sentences.chinese: 用于急，慢性鼻炎的症状。

sentences.english: Objective To find out an effective acupuncture therapy for children allergic rhinitis.
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨美容毫针针刺治疗儿童变应性鼻炎的疗效。

sentences.english: CONCLUSION Tongbi capsule has inhibitory action on allergic rhinitis.
sentences.chinese: 通鼻胶囊对豚鼠变态反应性鼻炎有一定的抑制作用。

sentences.english: Nose is urticant, often think sneeze, be irritability rhinitis?
sentences.chinese: 鼻子痒，老想打喷嚏，是过敏性鼻炎吗？

sentences.english: Rhinitis can also be a feature of other diseases and medical conditions.
sentences.chinese: 鼻炎，也可以是一个其他疾病和医疗条件的功能。

definition: bacterial tracheitis (inflammation of the windpipe, often caused by Staphylococcus aureus)/henpecked (a pun on 妻子管得严 used in comic theater)
to catch cold/(common) cold/CL:場|场[chang2],次[ci4]/(coll.) to be interested in (often used in the negative)/(Tw) to detest/can't stand

pinyin: shang4 hu1 xi1 dao4 gan3 ran3
